node.title: Police say unvaxxed Queenslanders won't 'grandstand' over bans, but venue owners say tensions are rising
node.alt: Bald man with glasses in suit and tie, with police badge on lanyard, in front of police van
node.description: The police union says extra officers will not be needed to enforce rules banning unvaxxedÂ people from hospitality venues, because most "are keen to do the right thing".
node.content:
["Queensland's police union says extra officers and resources will not\u00a0be needed to enforce rules banning\u00a0unvaccinated people from entering pubs, clubs, cafes and other venues from tomorrow, because \"most people are keen to do the right thing\".\u00a0", "But hospitality venue owners say they are already facing aggression from frustrated customers, and have been for weeks ahead of the change in rules.", "The state's border restrictions were relaxed on\u00a0Monday after Queensland reached its 80-per-cent vaccination target ahead of schedule.", "Now almost 90 per cent\u00a0of eligible Queenslanders over 16 have received at least one dose of a\u00a0COVID-19 vaccine.", "But this week's border changes also triggered new rules for the unvaccinated, including barring them\u00a0from hotels, pubs, bars, cafes, festivals and stadiums from tomorrow.", "Small Business Minister Di Farmer told businesses on the Gold Coast earlier this month that anyone refusing to provide proof of their vaccine status should be asked to leave the premises.", "If they refused or became abusive, Ms Farmer said owners or managers should call the police.", "", "
Dining in cafes will be off-limits to those who are yet to be fully vaccinated.(ABC Sunshine Coast: Janel Shorthouse)
", "Queensland Police Union vice-president Shane Prior said he expected those calls to be rare, if they happened at all.", "\"We're confident that most people are keen to do the right thing,\" he said.", "
'We're not discriminating'\u00a0
", "The Wharf Mooloolaba on Queensland's Sunshine Coast is a popular dining spot, with more than a dozen cafes, bars and restaurants.", "Wharf owner Dirk Long said people had\u00a0already become angry at venue staff ahead of the looming changes.", "\"We're having a lot of people saying, 'Are you going to discriminate against us?',\" he said.", "", "
The Wharf Mooloolaba owner Dirk Long says venue staff are already facing aggression from some people.(ABC Sunshine Coast: Janel Shorthouse)
", "Mr Long said he feared\u00a0police would\u00a0be overwhelmed by the number of calls from businesses.", "\"People are very aggressive about it, and they're not overly well informed,\" he said.", "\"People really don't know what the facts are in some instances, but they still are very vocal.", "
Police vow to act if staff face abuse\u00a0
", "Mr Prior said police would be\u00a0capable of handling the calls, even if their teams were small or they were working in isolated areas.", "\"No matter where police are in Queensland, they've proven that they can be adaptable to change, and they will continue to keep our community safe,\" he said.", "", "
Sunshine Coast Superintendent Craig Hawkins says it will be \"reprehensible\"\u00a0if people are abusive towards hospitality staff.(ABC Sunshine Coast: Owen Jacques)
", "Superintendent Craig Hawkins said police would respond if unvaccinated punters started abusing or challenging staff when refused entry.", "\"I'd be very disappointed if that happened.", "\"Where that does happen, although police are very, very tolerant, under these circumstances there is a line.", "\"When that line is crossed, the police will take appropriate action.\"", "Businesses could face fines of up to $14,000 if found not following the government direction.", "Inspector Hawkins said police would act on complaints but would also be visiting businesses to ensure they were following the government's rules.", "Queensland recorded six new locally acquired cases of COVID-19 on Wednesday, including in Goondiwindi, Wide Bay, Townsville, Brisbane and on the Gold Coast.", "", "
Why we hear about some COVID-19 variants more than others
"]
